field.value: System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException in Castle.Facilities.IBatisNetIntegration.Tests.Dao.AccountDao.GetAccount(int id) after SVN change 4157

field.name: description
field.value:
When building castle with ccnet, during the tests on Castle.Facilities.IBatisNetIntegration.Tests an unhandled System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException is raised. This stops the build with status "Exception". It happened when the commit of SVN change 4157 triggered a build
At line 96 of Castle.Facilities.IBatisNetIntegration.Tests.DaoTestCase.ExecuteMethodUntilSignal() the following code: account = _dao.GetAccount(id); it calls Castle.Facilities.IBatisNetIntegration.Tests.Dao.AccountDao.GetAccount(int id). This method has only 1 line: return _sqlMap.QueryForObject("GetAccount", id) as Account; and here an unhandled exception is raised (well, in reality it is raised inside IBatisNet.DataMapper.DLL, in the IBatisNet.DataMapper.SqlMapper.QueryForObject(string statementName, object parameterObject) + 0x86 bytes, but I haven't the source code for that on my build machine). The exception message is "Length cannot be less than zero" and the exception is of type System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException.
After I stop the debugging of the build, in the Nant output of ccnet dashboard I can read:
